item.title: [dmc] Faithless Looting
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [dmc] Etali, Primal Storm
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dinosaur

Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.

item.title: [dmc] Captain Lannery Storm
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Pirate

Haste

Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [dmc] Ashling the Pilgrim
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elemental Shaman

{1}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ashling the Pilgrim. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, remove all +1/+1 counters from Ashling the Pilgrim, and it deals that much damage to each creature and each player.

item.title: [dmc] Alesha, Who Smiles at Death
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

First strike

Whenever Alesha, Who Smiles at Death attacks, you may pay {W/B}{W/B}. If you do, return target creature card with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

item.title: [dmc] Radiant Flames
item.description:
Sorcery

Converge — Radiant Flames deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

item.title: [dmc] Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Minotaur Warrior

Trample

Whenever Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may discard any number of cards. If you do, draw that many cards and add that much {R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

item.title: [dmc] Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin

Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

item.title: [dmc] Kari Zev, Skyship Raider
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Pirate

First strike, menace

Whenever Kari Zev, Skyship Raider attacks, create Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey creature token. Ragavan enters the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

item.title: [dmc] Explore
item.description:
Sorcery

You may play an additional land this turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [dmc] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [dmc] Beast Within
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [dmc] Abundant Growth
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant land

When Abundant Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

item.title: [dmc] Migration Path
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [dmc] Kodama's Reach
item.description:
Sorcery — Arcane

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [dmc] Farseek
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [dmc] Explosive Vegetation
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [dmc] Search for Tomorrow
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [dmc] Path to the World Tree
item.description:
Enchantment

When Path to the World Tree enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

{2}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, Sacrifice Path to the World Tree: You gain 2 life and draw two cards. Target opponent loses 2 life. Path to the World Tree deals 2 damage to up to one target creature. You create a 2/2 green Bear creature token.

item.title: [dmc] Arvad the Cursed
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Knight

Deathtouch, lifelink

Other legendary creatures you control get +2/+2.

item.title: [dmc] Archelos, Lagoon Mystic
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Turtle Shaman

As long as Archelos, Lagoon Mystic is tapped, other permanents enter the battlefield tapped.

As long as Archelos is untapped, other permanents enter the battlefield untapped.

item.title: [dmc] Adriana, Captain of the Guard
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Knight

Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

Other creatures you control have melee. (If a creature has multiple instances of melee, each triggers separately.)

item.title: [dmc] Abzan Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Exile target creature with power 3 or greater.

• You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

• Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

item.title: [dmc] Chromanticore
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Manticore

Bestow {2}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.)

Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, lifelink

Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, and lifelink.

item.title: [dmc] Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Soldier

Note the mana value of each card as it's put into exile.

Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant's power is equal to the greatest number noted for it this turn.

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

item.title: [dmc] Bedevil
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.

item.title: [dmc] Atla Palani, Nest Tender
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Shaman

{2}, {T}: Create a 0/1 green Egg creature token with defender.

Whenever an Egg you control dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [dmc] Garna, the Bloodflame
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Warrior

Flash

When Garna, the Bloodflame enters the battlefield, return to your hand all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from anywhere this turn.

Other creatures you control have haste.

item.title: [dmc] Fusion Elemental
item.description: Creature — Elemental

item.title: [dmc] Duneblast
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose up to one creature. Destroy the rest.

item.title: [dmc] Coiling Oracle
item.description:
Creature — Snake Elf Druid

When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

item.title: [dmc] Knight of New Alara
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

Each other multicolored creature you control gets +1/+1 for each of its colors.

item.title: [dmc] Kaya's Wrath
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures. You gain life equal to the number of creatures you controlled that were destroyed this way.

item.title: [dmc] Growth Spiral
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [dmc] Glint-Eye Nephilim
item.description:
Creature — Nephilim

Whenever Glint-Eye Nephilim deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards.

{1}, Discard a card: Glint-Eye Nephilim gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [dmc] Naya Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Naya Charm deals 3 damage to target creature.

• Return target card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.

• Tap all creatures target player controls.

item.title: [dmc] Mortify
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or enchantment.

item.title: [dmc] Merciless Eviction
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Exile all artifacts.

• Exile all creatures.

• Exile all enchantments.

• Exile all planeswalkers.

item.title: [dmc] Maelstrom Archangel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Whenever Maelstrom Archangel deals combat damage to a player, you may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.

item.title: [dmc] Lavalanche
item.description:
Sorcery

Lavalanche deals X damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

item.title: [dmc] Sultai Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Destroy target monocolored creature.

• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

• Draw two cards, then discard a card.

item.title: [dmc] Selvala, Explorer Returned
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Scout

Parley — {T}: Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, add {G} and you gain 1 life. Then each player draws a card.

item.title: [dmc] Rienne, Angel of Rebirth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel

Flying

Other multicolored creatures you control get +1/+0.

Whenever another multicolored creature you control dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [dmc] Primevals' Glorious Rebirth
item.description:
Legendary Sorcery

(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)

Return all legendary permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [dmc] Time Wipe
item.description:
Sorcery

Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

item.title: [dmc] Terminate
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.title: [dmc] Tajic, Blade of the Legion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Indestructible

Battalion — Whenever Tajic, Blade of the Legion and at least two other creatures attack, Tajic gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

item.title: [dmc] Sylvan Reclamation
item.description:
Instant

Exile up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments.

Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

item.title: [dmc] Zaxara, the Exemplary
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Nightmare Hydra

Deathtouch

{T}: Add two mana of any one color.

Whenever you cast a spell with {X} in its mana cost, create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token, then put X +1/+1 counters on it.

item.title: [dmc] Xyris, the Writhing Storm
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Snake Leviathan

Flying

Whenever an opponent draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, create a 1/1 green Snake creature token.

Whenever Xyris, the Writhing Storm deals combat damage to a player, you and that player each draw that many cards.
